mapper.sql: invoice_bill_id AS "invoiceBillId", money AS "money", enclosure_id AS "enclosureId", name AS "name", Invoice_date AS "invoiceDate", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_invoice_bill where 1 = 1
and invoice_bill_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.invoiceBillId},'%')
and money like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.money},'%')
and enclosure_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.enclosureId},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
and Invoice_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.invoiceDate},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
